Container.Name: cloudflared
Container.Overview: Cloudflared is a tunneling daemon that proxies traffic from the Cloudflare network to your origins. This container runs cloudflared in tunnel mode to securely connect your services to Cloudflare without exposing them to the public internet directly.

Config.Name: Tunnel Token
Config.Description: Your Cloudflare tunnel token. Get this from the Cloudflare Zero Trust dashboard when creating a tunnel.

Config.Name: Additional Environment Variables
Config.Description: Additional environment variables in KEY=VALUE format, one per line
